root.name: Twin Sector
root.description: Twin Sector takes place in a Futuristic Post-Apocalyptic world humans have been frozen in a deep sleep cryogenic chambers that lie deep beneath the earths crust, the player will take the roll of Ashley Simms when they first start Twin Sector and emerge from your cryogenic chamber.System RequirementsOS: Windows XP Sp3, Windows Vista Sp2Processor: 2.4 ghz multicore recommendedMemory: 1.0 GB or moreGraphics: 256 MB, Shader model 2.0, ATI 9600, NVidia 6600 or better, recommended Shader model 3.0DirectXÂ®: 9.0cHard Drive: 3.5 GBSound: DirectX 9.0c compatible soundcard
